title: The client is very buggy
body:
First it didnt let me log in, it would wait and wait and then just tell me it could not log me in.
Now that i am finally in and starting a game, it gives me error messages that" readycheck had an unexpected error".
I accept the ready check but it doesnt let me into the game..
Its also giving me "trying to reconnects while in queue.
I am a little afraid that it might kick me from the game at some point.
And before you tell me that it might be my internet, see below.

http://www.speedtest.net/my-result/6723868024

replies.body: Though your internet might be okay, it sounds like you might have some serious connection blocks and instability cutting you off from most of our services.  You'll want to run through each step of our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up.
